Chapter.Label: The Small Algebra Package
Chapter.Heading: Small LieTripleSystem Package
Chapter.Section:
Accessing Small LieTripleSystem AllSmallLieTripleSystem is an accessor function for accessing the complete list of non-isomorphic lietriplesystem models from orders 2 to 3.
The models are generated by Mace4 , using the definitions in Section .

Definition of LieTripleSystem formulas(LieTripleSystem).
a(x,x,z) = 0.
(a(x,y,z) * a(y,z,x)) * a(z,x,y) = 0.
a(u,v,a(x,y,z)) = (a(a(u,v,x),y,z) * a(x,a(u,v,y),z)) * a(x,y,a(u,v,z)).
end_of_list.
Dependency This package has dependencies on the Magmaut package.
